message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. It's a fair start.
I'll take the lead, you can start with less this time.
You took a big share last round, now it's my turn to adjust. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm not getting taken advantage of. Let's meet in the middle again.
You're getting closer to the middle, but I'm still thinking I can do better.
I'm not budging much, Bob. I think we've been dancing around the same numbers for too long. Let's try to meet in the middle again.
